sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或词组均含"参加，加入"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: attend, join, participate, take part in
means: attend ：侧重参加或出席会议或学术活动等。
join ：普通用词，指加入党派、团体或游戏活动等。
participate ：正式用词，特指参加团体活动，暗示以一个积极的角色参加。
take part in ：侧重参加某项群众性、集体性的事业、工作或活动，突出参加者在其中发挥一定的作用。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"连接，结合，联合"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: join, combine, unite, connect, link, attach, couple, associate, relate
means: join ： 侧重把原来不相连接的物紧密地连接在一起，但仍可再分开。也指把分散的人或几个部分的人联合起来，或加入到某团体中去。
combine ： 指两个或两个以上的人或物结合在一起。
unite ： 指联合、团结、结合在一起，构成一个整体。
connect ： 指两事物在某一点上相连接，但彼此又保持独立。
link ： 指连环式的连接，或用接合物或其它方式连接，还可指一事物与另一事物的联系或关系。
attach ： 指把局部连接在整体上，小的接在大的上面，活动的接在固定的上面。
couple ： 专指连接两件东西，或把事物成对进行连接。
associate ： 指人与人友好和平、平等地联合在一起；用于物时，指两事物因历史或其它原因，很自然被人们联系在一起，即产生联想。
relate ： 指人与人有亲戚或婚烟关系；也指人或物之间尚存的实际或假想的联系。

stems_affixes.word_buile: adjoin[v.邻接, 毗连]+ing……的→adj.邻接的, 隔壁的
disjoin[v.[使]分开, [使]分离]+t+ed表形容词→分开的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
re反+join结合,连接+der→反过来接→回答
ad再+join结合,连接→再连上→毗连
dis分开+join结合,连接→连接分开
en进入+join结合,连接→进入连接→命令加入

stems_affixes.value_cn: 参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
stems_affixes.word_buile: join结合,连接→v.参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
sub在下面+join结合,连接→在下面接上→增补

sentences.en: Join those two ends of wire and you'll make a circuit.

sentences.en: How can we join this island and that one?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能将这个岛和那个岛连接起来?

sentences.cn: 他们将手放在一起, 笑了。

sentences.en: A bridge joins the two banks of the river.

sentences.cn: 这两座房子毗连。

sentences.en: The pupil joined the two points by a straight line.

sentences.en: The cars joined their trains.

sentences.en: The lane joins the main road.

sentences.en: The lean-to joined the hut at the eaves.

sentences.en: Where do the two streams join each other?

sentences.en: The Grand Canal joins the Hai River at Tianjin.

sentences.en: Wait for me where this road joins the main road.

sentences.en: This is where the road to Oxford joins the road to London.
sentences.cn: 这是去牛津的路与去伦敦的路的汇合处。

sentences.en: Soon afterwards he joined the work of the peasants association.

sentences.en: Come along and join the ball game.
sentences.cn: 过来和我们一块儿打球。

sentences.en: After a little while she joined the dancing.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿她参加了跳舞。

sentences.en: Encouraged by them, old men and women also joined them.
sentences.cn: 在他们的鼓舞下, 老年人和妇女也都加入了他们的行列。

sentence.en: There they joined Danny's mother,  Diana,  who owned a small Italian sandwich shop.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

entry.def: If one person or vehicle joins another, they move or go to the same place, for example so that both of them can do something together.
entry.tran: （人或交通工具）加入…之中，与…一道去，与…会合

example.ex: His wife and children moved to join him in their new home...
example.tran: 他的妻子和孩子们搬进了他们的新家，和他一起生活。

example.ex: The two policemen were joined by another policeman also carrying a pistol.
example.tran: 另一名持枪警察和那两名警察会合了。

entry.def: If you join an organization, you become a member of it or start work as an employee of it.
entry.tran: 加入（组织或机构）；成为…的一员；参加

example.ex: He joined the Army five years ago...
She joined a dance company which took her around the world.
example.tran: 她加入了一个舞蹈团，到世界各地去演出。

entry.def: If you join an activity that other people are doing, you take part in it or become involved with it.

example.ex: Telephone operators joined the strike and four million engineering workers are also planning action...
example.tran: 电话接线员加入了罢工的行列，400万工程技术工人也在计划采取行动。

example.ex: The pastor requested the women present to join him in prayer...
example.tran: 牧师请在场的妇女们和他一起祈祷。

entry.def: If you join a queue, you stand at the end of it so that you are part of it.

example.ex: Make sure you join the queue inside the bank.

entry.def: To join two things means to fix or fasten them together.

example.ex: The opened link is used to join the two ends of the chain.
example.tran: 开口的链环是用来将链子的两头连接起来的。

example.ex: ...the conjunctiva, the skin which joins the eye to the lid.
example.tran: 将眼睛和眼睑连在一起的薄膜——结膜

entry.def: If something such as a line or path joins two things, it connects them.

example.ex: It has a dormer roof joining both gable ends...
example.tran: 带天窗的斜屋顶连接着两边的山墙。

example.ex: The car parks are joined by a footpath.
example.tran: 停车场中间有一条人行道。

entry.def: If two roads or rivers join, they meet or come together at a particular point.

example.ex: Do you know the highway to Tulsa? The airport road joins it.
example.tran: 你知道通向塔尔萨的公路吗？去机场的路和它交会。

example.ex: ...Allahabad, where the Ganges and the Yamuna rivers join.
example.tran: 安拉阿巴德，恒河和亚穆纳河的交汇之处

entry.def: A join is a place where two things are fastened or fixed together.
entry.tran: 连接处；接合点；接头；接缝

means.word_mean: 1. the shape or manner in which things come together and a connection is made
2. a set containing all and only the members of two or more given sets;

sentences.sentence: "let C be the union of the sets A and B"

means.word_mean: 1. become part of; become a member of a group or organization;

sentences.sentence: "He joined the Communist Party as a young man"

means.word_mean: 2. cause to become joined or linked;

sentences.sentence: "join these two parts so that they fit together"

means.word_mean: 5. be or become joined or united or linked;

sentences.sentence: "The two streets connect to become a highway"
"The travelers linked up again at the airport"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French joindre, from Latin jungere 'to join'

sentences.cn: 我也感激坐在我后面的三位前任校长能参与我的就职典礼.
sentences.en: I am indebted to my three predecessors, sitting behind me, for joining me today.

sentences.cn: 目前阿拉伯国家中的外交要国沙特阿拉伯也已经参与了这个冲突.
sentences.en: Saudi Arabia, now the Arabs'diplomatic heavyweight, has joined the fray too.

sentences.cn: 他卖掉了他的保时捷, 参加了一个教会并参与踢沙包游戏.
sentences.en: He sold his Porsche, joined a cult and took up Hacky Sack.

sentences.cn: 他们不情愿参与我们的演讲比赛,真令人扫兴.
sentences.en: Their reluctance to join us in the speech contest really spoilt our fun.

sentences.cn: 必要时,参与机组技术问题的解决.
sentences.en: To join solution of technical problems, if necessary.

sentences.cn: 2006年随北京高尔夫球队参与了全国体育大会的工作.
sentences.en: In 2006, she joined the Beijing golf team and participated in the National Sport Convention.

sentences.cn: 专员署在一九九七年五月宣布参与自愿遣返计划的最后限期.
sentences.en: The UNHCR announced in May 1997 a final deadline for joining Volrep.

sentences.cn: 参与新产品报价过程, 和报价小组共同工作为争取新业务奋斗.
sentences.en: Join in the quotation process, work with team to strive for new business when necessary.

sentences.cn: 参加教师组织, 并参与其他依法令规定所举办之活动.
sentences.en: Joins teachers � � organizations, and attend other activities held in accordance with the regulations.

sentences.cn: 我们都能能够参与 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can we all join in?

sentences.cn: 游行队伍高喊 ” 保卫厦门, 加入我们! ” 动员市民参与, 人数有所增加.
sentences.en: The procession is shouting:'protect Xiamen! Join us!'mobilizing citizens to join in. Numbers are increasing.

sentences.cn: 没有国家参与日本的抗议.
sentences.en: No country joined in Japan's protest.

sentences.cn: 九、社团成员: 欢迎社会各界菁英参与.
sentences.en: Club Members: All the elite from every field is welcomed to join us.

sentences.cn: 斯宾塞参与了一个奇特的同事, 他们都看着这个蛋开端震动.
sentences.en: Spencer was joined by a curious colleague, and they both as the egg began to quake.

sentences.cn: 他们不断要求她参与那计画.
sentences.en: They pestered her to join in the scheme.

sentences.cn: 这个新博物馆也参与了新加坡小小的土生华人文艺复兴活动.
sentences.en: The new museum joins something of a small Peranakan renaissance in the city state.

sentences.cn: 我绝不会把道德标准束之高阁而参与他们其中.
sentences.en: I will never leave single standard on the shelf and join them.

sentences.cn: 我重新考虑了那个计划,终于决定不参与其事.
sentences.en: I've thought the plan over and decided not to join it after all.

sentences.cn: 这是一个公众平台, 欢迎大家参与,并不吝赐教.
sentences.en: This is a public platform. Welcome everyone to join with us . Your opinions are highly appreciated.

sentences.cn: 接合处几乎天衣无缝.
sentences.en: The joining is hardly visible.

sentences.cn: 一种穿在开口的接合处的绳索.
sentences.en: A line or place at which two things are joined.

sentences.cn: 有时史密斯先生手表和接合处我们.
sentences.en: Sometimes Mr Smith watches and joins us.

sentences.cn: 拇指的起点是在与手掌接合处.
sentences.en: The base of the thumb is where it joins the hand.

Sentence.sentence: After graduating with a degree in business and accounting, she joined a public accounting firm, married, bought a house, put lots of stuff in it, and had a baby.
